entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow or rain beginning this morning and ending this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:01 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
